title: A bill to provide compensation to the Keweenaw Bay Indian Community for the taking without just compensation of land by the United States inside the exterior boundaries of the L'Anse Indian Reservation that were guaranteed to the Community under a treaty signed in 1854, and for other purposes.
latest_action: Senate - 02/19/2025 Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs. ( All Actions )
status: This bill has the status Introduced
